attributes.action: stop the donkey cruelty in spain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we think donkeys are great animals and what is the point in hurting them when they are perfectly harmless creatures! This may be laughed at , but these animals are being maltreated in some parts of the world..!aswell as that you dont see many now adays in england and i think we should because we are the only country who would look after them propobly.to conclude this the cruelty should stop and we should start donkey races or something to help bring them back and make people realise how important they are.
